"Passwords must be at least 8 characters long (including letters and numbers, uppercase and lowercase)
Passwords have better security value when there are special characters (@ # $% ^ "...)
Passwords must be changed periodically (at least once a year)
Do not use basic personal information (date of birth, telephone number, name of yourself, name of relatives like spouse / children, simple serial number such as 1234567 ...) to set the password"
Please call our Customer Suppor %s if you need any assistance
Your account has been successfully created. To log in faster next time, please go to settings and enable the Log in By Touch ID feature
